Struct template sample_type

boost::histogram::sample_type — Sample holder and type envelope.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/histogram/sample.hpp>

template<typename T> 
struct sample_type {

  // public data members
  T value;
};

Description

You should not construct these directly, use the sample() helper function.
